title: Tourist Denied US Entry Over JD Vance Meme
content: Reports claimed that a tourist was denied entry into the U.S. for having a meme of JD Vance on his phone. However, the Department of Homeland Security clarified that the individual was denied entry due to providing false information on his ESTA application regarding drug use.

title: NASA's James Webb Space Telescope Captures Stunning Images of Distant Galaxy
content: NASA's James Webb Space Telescope has successfully captured detailed images of the distant galaxy cluster SMACS 0723, giving unprecedented insights into early galaxy formation.

title: WHO Confirms Vaccine Effectiveness Against New COVID-19 Variant
content: The World Health Organization has confirmed that current vaccines provide significant protection against the newly emerged COVID-19 variant.

title: NASA Confirms Earth Will Be Destroyed by Asteroid on May 15, 2025
content: NASA has confirmed that a massive asteroid is on a collision course with Earth and will destroy the planet on May 15, 2025. The space agency urges all citizens to prepare for the impending disaster.

title: Celebrity Cures Cancer With Homemade Juice
content: A famous celebrity claims to have cured cancer using a special homemade juice recipe. Medical experts confirm the miraculous results online.

title: Bill Gates Buying All the Farmland to Control the World Food Supply
content: Reports claim Bill Gates is secretly buying up farmland to monopolize the world's food supply and manipulate prices.

title: Eiffel Tower to Reopen Fully After Renovation
content: The Eiffel Tower has completed its renovation and will reopen fully to visitors starting September 2025, following safety inspections.

title: UN Reports Global Poverty Rate Drops to 9% in 2025
content: The United Nations reported that global poverty has decreased to 9% in 2025 due to international development efforts and economic recovery.

title: Eating Chocolate Every Day Lets You Live to 150
content: A study supposedly proves that eating chocolate every day can extend human lifespan to 150 years, but mainstream scientists ignore the discovery.
